---
description: 'Learn how to request funds from the faucet to an account output.'
image: /img/logo/iota_mark_light.png

  - how to
  - wallet
  - send funds
  - account output
  - nodejs
  - python
  - rust
---
import Tabs from '@theme/Tabs';
import TabItem from '@theme/TabItem';

# Send Funds From an Account Ouput

## Example Code

<Tabs groupId="language" queryString>
<TabItem value="rust" label="Rust">

1. Define the [`SyncOptions`]((https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/wallet/struct.SyncOptions.html)
    to fetch [`BasicOutputs`]((https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/types/block/output/basic/struct.BasicOutput.html)
    for [`AccountOutputs`]((https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/types/block/output/account/struct.AccountOutput.html)
    by setting the `basic_outputs` field to `true` in the [`AccountSyncOptions`]((https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/wallet/struct.AccountSyncOptions.html).

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/sdk/examples/how_tos/account_output/send_amount.rs#L25-L31
```

</div>

2. Instantiate a [Wallet]((https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/wallet/core/struct.Wallet.html) and [sync it](../wallet/check-balance.mdx).
3. Retrieve the first [`AccountId`]((https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/types/block/output/account/struct.AccountId.html) from the
[`Balance`]((https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/wallet/types/struct.Balance.html) by calling
the [`Balance.accounts()`]((https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/wallet/types/struct.Balance.html#method.accounts) function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/sdk/examples/how_tos/account_output/send_amount.rs#L47
```

</div>

4. Get the [`AccountAddress`]((https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/types/block/address/struct.AccountAddress.html)
    for the `AccountId` that was retrieved in step 3, and transform it to Bech32 using the
    [`AccountAddress.toBech32()`]((https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/types/block/address/account/struct.AccountAddress.html#method.to_bech32)
    function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/sdk/examples/how_tos/account_output/send_amount.rs#L51
```

</div>

5. Define the [Transaction inputs]((https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/types/block/payload/signed_transaction/struct.Transaction.html#structfield.inputs)
    as the first `Output` that can be unlocked by the `AccountAddress`.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/sdk/examples/how_tos/account_output/send_amount.rs#L54-L62
```

</div>

6. Use the [`Wallet.send()`]((https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/wallet/core/struct.Wallet.html#method.send)
    function passing the inputs defined in step 4 in the  [`TransactionOptions`]((https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/wallet/struct.TransactionOptions.html).

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/sdk/examples/how_tos/account_output/send_amount.rs#L64-L73
```

</div>

7. Await for the transaction to be accepted by the network by calling the [`Wallet.wait_for_transaction_acceptance()`]((https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/wallet/core/struct.Wallet.html#method.wait_for_transaction_acceptance) function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/sdk/examples/how_tos/account_output/send_amount.rs#L74-L76
```

</div>
</TabItem>
<TabItem value="typescript-node" label="Typescript (Node.js)">

1. Define the [`SyncOptions`](../../references/nodejs/interfaces/SyncOptions.md)
    to fetch [`BasicOutputs`](../../references/nodejs/classes/BasicOutput.md)
    for [`AccountOutputs`](../../references/nodejs/classes/AccountOutput.md)
    by setting the `basic_outputs` field to `true` in the [`AccountSyncOptions`](../../references/nodejs/interfaces/AccountSyncOptions.md).

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/account_output/send-amount.ts#L28-L32
```

</div>

2. Instantiate a [`Wallet`](../../references/nodejs/classes/Wallet.md) and [sync it](../wallet/check-balance.mdx).
3. Retrieve the first [`AccountOutput`](../../references/nodejs/classes/AccountOutput.md) from the
    [`Balance`](../../references/nodejs/interfaces/Balance.md) by accessing
    the [`Balance.accounts](../../references/nodejs/interfaces/Balance.md#accounts) property.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/account_output/send-amount.ts#L49
```

</div>

4. Get the [`AccountAddress`](../../references/nodejs/classes/AccountAddress.md)
for the `AccountId` that was retrieved in step 2, and transform it to Bech32 using the
[`Utils.accountIdToBech32()`](../../references/nodejs/classes/Utils.md#accountidtobech32)
function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/account_output/send-amount.ts#L55-L58
```

</div>

5. Define the [Transaction inputs](../../references/nodejs/classes/Transaction.md#inputs)
    as the first `Output` that can be unlocked by the `AccountAddress`.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/account_output/send-amount.ts#L61-L64
```

</div>

6. Use the [`Wallet.sendWithParams()`](../../references/nodejs/classes/Wallet.md#sendwithparams)
    function passing the inputs defined in step 5 in the [`TransactionOptions`](../../references/nodejs/interfaces/TransactionOptions.md).

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/account_output/send-amount.ts#L66-L77
```

</div>

7. Await for the [`Transaction`](../../references/nodejs/classes/Transaction.md) to get confirmed by calling the
    [`Wallet.waitForTransactionAcceptance()`](../../references/nodejs/classes/Wallet.md#waitfortransactionacceptance)
    function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/nodejs/examples/how_tos/account_output/send-amount.ts#L78
```

</div>
</TabItem>
<TabItem value="python" label="Python">


1. Define the [`SyncOptions`](../../references/python/iota_sdk/wallet/sync_options.md#syncoptions-objects)
to fetch [`BasicOutputs`](../../references/python/iota_sdk/types/output.md#basicoutput-objects)
for [`AccountOutputs`](../../references/nodejs/classes/AccountOutput.md)
by setting the `basic_outputs` field to `true` in the [`WalletSyncOptions`](../../references/python/iota_sdk/wallet/sync_options.md#walletsyncoptions-objects).

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```python reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/python/examples/how_tos/account_output/send_amount.py#L18
```

</div>

2. Instantiate a [`Wallet`](../../references/python/iota_sdk/wallet/wallet.md) and [sync it](../wallet/check-balance.mdx).
3. Retrieve the first [`AccountOutput`](../../references/python/iota_sdk/types/output.md#accountoutput-objects) from the
    [`Balance`](../../references/python/iota_sdk/types/balance.md) by accessing
    the [`Balance.accounts](../../references/python/iota_sdk/types/balance.md#balance-objects) attribute.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```python reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/python/examples/how_tos/account_output/send_amount.py#L25
```

</div>

4. Get the [`AccountAddress`](../../references/python/iota_sdk/types/address.md#accountaddress-objects)
    for the `AccountId` that was retrieved in step 3, and transform it to Bech32 using the
    [`Utils.account_id_to_bech32()`](../../references/python/iota_sdk/utils.md#account_id_to_bech32)
    function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```python reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/python/examples/how_tos/account_output/send_amount.py#L29-L30
```

</div>

5. Define the [Transaction inputs](../../references/python/iota_sdk/types/input.md)
as the first `Output` that can be unlocked by the `AccountAddress`.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```python reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/python/examples/how_tos/account_output/send_amount.py#L33-L35
```

</div>

6. Use the [`Wallet.send_with_params()`](../../references/python/iota_sdk/wallet/wallet.md#send_with_params)
function passing the inputs defined in step 5 in the [`TransactionOptions`](../../references/python/iota_sdk/types/transaction_options.md).

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```typescript reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/python/examples/how_tos/account_output/send_amount.py#L37-L44
```

</div>

7. Await for the transaction to get accepted by calling the [`Wallet.wait_for_transaction_acceptance()`](../../references/python/iota_sdk/wallet/wallet.md#wait_for_transaction_acceptance)
    function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```python reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/2.0/bindings/python/examples/how_tos/account_output/send_amount.py#L45-L46
```

</div>
</TabItem>
</Tabs>
